summary: this patch is intended for users of EEO and HHA without getting the gray face bug.
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#e06666]Desription.:[/color][/b]

[i]This patch fixes the gray face bug for users who likes both [/i][color=#6d9eeb][b]Ethereal Elven Overhaul [/b][/color][i]and [/i][color=#6d9eeb][b]Hallgarth's hair for Npc.[/b][/color]
[i]Allowing Nuska face model changes kept applied while having Hallgarth hairs being distributed among the vanilla NPC.[/i]

[color=#e06666][b]List of NPCs revised with this patch:[/b][/color]

Melaran
Dinya
Nivenor
Romlyn
Valindor
Nenya
Dravynea
Reldith
Aicantar
Voldsea Giryon
Niranye
Faryl Atheron
BelynHlaalu
MalthyrElenil
Curwe
Karliah
Marlur Seloth
Brelyna Maryon
Faralda
Enthir
Niruin
Edorfin
Aranea Lenith
Gadnor
Arvel the Swift
Valie
Orchendor
Gwilin
Champion of Boethia
Orinia Dral
Ravyn Imyan
Synda Llanith

+LevelList Mages/Bandits/Necromancers/ThalmorSoldiers, etc...

[b][color=#e06666]Requirements:[/color]
[/b]
All [i]DLC[/i]
Lastest Version of [i]Ethereal Elven Overhaul[/i] (Plus [i]Usleep aka Unofficial Skyrim Legendary Edition Patch[/i])
[i]Hallgarth's hair for NPC[/i] (plus its original mod and Master [i]Hallgarth's Additional (Vanilla) Hair[/i])

...yes, this fix requires 4 mods to work.



[b][color=#e06666]Credits:[/color]

[/b]Bethesda
Nuska
Thordir
Nemesis The Warlock
The USLEEP team
Hallgarth
IndigoCrow
author: TheBxushis
